column2: The wife found this place on Google maps....so glad she did. The service was exceptionally great, fast, and satisfying. 3 Beautifully Spirited Ladies running the place, and very accommodating. Food came to our table hot and ready to eat. Simply Delicious. Other customers coming in were obviously previous customers, very relaxing (cozy), in and out in minutes. A true taste of San Francisco (in my opinion)

Great, simple, clean cafe and breakfast restaurant.  This is one of the few places post-pandemic that relies on providing good value for money and serving more customers rather than simply jacking up prices and hoping for the best.  I like the values they stand for, and their breakfast sandwiches:).
Great neighborhood place to eat in or take out. For me it's perfect for grabbing  homemade type sandwiches on my way to work or on a tight schedule and need something fast and inexpensive.
The french toast here is great, its not usually crowded, and the prices are half of any other breakfast place in sfo.

Simple, but very tasty breakfast options available: from bagel, cheese sandwich to pancakes or muffins. Staff is great and extremely friendly. Prices are fair. If you want some good food for a good price served by friendly staff - we can highly recommend this place. A lot of locals come around for their daily breakfast/snack routine.
I have a Egg avocado tomato bagel and it's delicious..with Cafe Au Lai!!!
this is a very nice cafe for breakfast with fair prices and delicious food
Tried the California bagel, with extra sunny side egg and a side of 3 pancakes. Yummy!
Microwaved breakfast products.croissant was buttery and crispy tho.
It is the ideal place for those who are in a hurry to work, but need to eat something fast. The price is good and service too.
Friendly place, good food and reasonable prices.
very nice place with friendly staff.  tuna sandwich and bagel lox  are delicious!

This is a charming little space run by two very friendly women. The breakfast I had was fresh, simple , and very nicely prepared. Lastly, the price was very reasonable , I started my day here multiple times during my visit to SF.
Very friendly staff, breakfast was served quickly. We had eggs with bacon and sausage, no complaints there. Reasonably priced.
Great service and good taste~ Clean environment
Great food and the ladies there are the kindest people

Incredibly nice staff & great service. Very affordable food & drinks. Great hidden spot right in downtown! Perfect for a quick breakfast/lunch or cheap coffee. There is inside & outside seating & to-go options as well. They will definitely cater to your preferences as possible. :) two very nice women running this joint!!!! Love to see it
Tiny itty bitty place, very friendly ladies running it.  Great place to grab a quick bite!
Amazing California bagel. Latte is okay. Great place overall 👍 …
Foods OK, bagel with egg and cheese for $4.25. About the same as I pay at Starbucks. Rushed, cramped, as friendly as a McDonald’s. It will do, but not much more than that.
Very tasty! The best place ih this area
The ladies here always know my order whether I call ahead or order in person. They make a great BLT or breakfast sandwhich. Great for a quick bite.
I highly recommend the Cozy Cafe! Wide selection of breakfasts, very delicious and the staff is very kind😊 …

We ate here almost everyday during our honeymoon. The girls behind the counter are so friendly and the food is absolutely delicious! We recommend the French toast and the San Francisco bagle! The OJ and the coffee are pretty amazing and the prices are very reasonable too!

Wouldn't ever want to have breakfast here again. Eggs and pancakes are low grade, and the price is no different than the cafe further down the block that serves at a much higher quality. The eggs are served from a container, which is why you only get the scrambled option. You clearly see them microwave most of their menu. NOT HOME COOKED, just cheap instant packaged produce
Great place, great food, great staff, and good prices.  This is my new FAV breakfast spot.

We stayes across the road in Vertigo Hotel and they dont do breakfast they recommended Cosy Cafe and it waa our go to place for Breakfast. The ladys are lovely and food is simple but great. Only place we found decent coffee whilst in USA. Highly recommend.
Great little place for breakfast, wanted something a little cheaper as didn't have breakfast included with our hotel. Tasty eggs and pancakes and coffee. Highly recommended.
My wife and I are here 4 days in a row on our honeymoon. The breakfast sandwiches are to die for (try the California). The ladies that run it are super nice, and I couldn't have asked for more.

Not sure who/why anyone gives this a low review (or why there are so many honeymoon reviews), but this place is very good. Local place with local customers, very good, freshly made sandwiches, friendly service. A gem!
Food very good. My english muffin was lovely and hot and the coffee was superb.much better than the other wishy washy stuff ive experienced so far on our trip to the usa.
Delicious!!! Hands down the best breakfast with quick and easy service. And the iced coffee will be in my dreams forever

Love love love Cosy cafe. From the great staff to the food to the sheer ambience of the surroundings, you just can't beat it. First day there was at the cafe when two police officers came if with a ukelele to serenade the gorgeous girls behind the counter. To me Cosy Cafe is everything I wanted the Haight district to be - super friendly, relaxed, everybody chilling on their own vibe but all together and all relaxed. Unlike much of the Haight I think they've managed to recreate the sixties culture without trying hard at all - they're not trying to be cool, they just are. And the coffee is to die for.
These Sisters serve up the best breakfast! Wash it down with a green tea smoothie and youll return the nextday to get your #2sisters bagel on!.....a cozy place for 2.
Great place to get a meal that tastes home made.😋I had the French toast, and the Ham/cheese croissant sandwich...delicious 👌🏾👍🏾👍🏾 …
Good coffee. Great sandwiches and breakfast plates. Always friendly and speedy service. Stop here everyday before work. Love it
Great breakfast croissants, sausage Swiss egg is my personal go-to
Love this little place. The name say it all. I love the food, friendly staff and the satisfaction to support this kind of small business. ❤
Great breakfast. Fresh juice, eggs as you like them, good coffee. Very friendly staff.
Kindly employees, fasf service, big quantity, price correct  I appreciated
They're so nice! I went a couple times while I was staying in san Francisco. So good! And not expensive at all.
Very kind and helpful staff :) quick, easy and good food. I got a banana and bagel
Nice and cozy place for some home style cooking. Small is good sometimes...enjoy!
Coffee was not good. They souhld have used more fresh beans
Service was great and food very good. Coffee hot and fresh.
Very good coffe, nice food (tastes like a home made one!!!)
Good food, hot coffee, helpful staff, and a recommended downtown cafe.
I really enjoyed my croissant breakfast sandwich. Good service.
Delicious bagels and breakfasts, friendly and fast service, good price
Good breakfast for reasonable prices. Superfriendly staff.
Great sandwiches and friendly staff. Great breakfast stopover.
Ate here twice in last few days. Good service, price and food
Real cozy
Really cozy as in small, but I really enjoyed the food.
Cute and clean little shop with awesome, scrumptious breakfast items.
Love this place, off the beaten path,  cheap and good eats.
Very cozy.  Ex food & service.
Very friendly service and tasty food!!!
A new hope in downtown SF.
Nice place ande good coffee
Absolutely adorable little place🙂. …
Lovely place, love it so much
Freash good food
Loving the bagels!!!!
Very tasty cheap breakfast! Nice service.

Very tasty breakfast at a fair price. The service is extremely friendly. The bagel with cream cheese, scrambled eggs and toast were delicious. 1 point deduction for the bacon, which was unfortunately not that good and too hard / brittle.

Perfect place to have breakfast in San Francisco. Very good food at good prices and very good treatment of the staff. We had breakfast two days, the two that we were in San Francisco and I would repeat without a doubt.
Simple, inexpensive cafe with very tasty and well-made breakfast options. Very friendly and hard-working staff.

A very great place to have breakfast. It tastes great and you can get very full for little money. The staff are very nice and they care about their customers already after the second time. It's also very clean and freshly made. The coffee is good compared to the broths you get elsewhere.

To have a real American breakfast without all the tourists who flock to the same places. Fresh food and all freshly prepared. The prices are the best in the area and for the quality of the service offered there is no comparison. To make us breakfast every morning!
I looked forward to that every morning. Fried eggs the Sunny side Up.
This was by far the best breakfast spot of our three days in San Francisco.  Super nice service Enjoy your meal Awesome price  Thumbs up 👍🏻
Excellent place to have breakfast. Varied, rich, accessible, good service. easy to get to.
Best breakfast in the USA so far😋... delicious, fresh and incredibly friendly service
Very nice and very clean place for breakfast or light meals.
Nice little breakfast/lunch shop next to the carlton hotel.
Fast, good prices. The regular bathroom, the rest correct.
nice site
Great breakfast place
